entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Kejimkujik (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kejimkujik Park 07:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 11.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of thundershowers overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
